description: Suggest adversarial review after planning sessions

hooks.command: jq -r '.last_assistant_message' 2>/dev/null | grep -qi 'ready to code' && echo '{"additionalContext": "Planning session complete. Consider asking for an adversarial review: \"What could go wrong with this plan?\" or \"/devils-advocate [plan-description]\" to engage The Devil's Advocate and challenge the assumptions."}' || exit 0
